org.jasig.cas.support.oauth

Class OAuthServletContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.web.AbstractServletContextInitializer
      • org.jasig.cas.support.oauth.OAuthServletContextListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextInitializer<org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext>, org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer

    @WebListener
@Component
public class OAuthServletContextListener
extends AbstractServletContextInitializer
    Initializes the CAS root servlet context to make sure OAuth endpoint can be activated by the main CAS servlet.
    Since:
    4.2
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
